Hi guys,

with the release of 1.0 I thought, letÃ‚Â´s start a new save and share my progress with this awesome community! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

LetÃ‚Â´s start then:

Part 0 - Information about the journey

I want the exploration of the Kerbol system to be similar as to our real world space exploration e.g. sending satellites first to map out the planet etc.

I will show you plenty screenshots about the mission planning, execution and other interesting details.

IÃ‚Â´m going to use the following mods:

[Atomic Age 2.0](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/104855-1-0-Atomic-Age-Nuclear-Rockets)

[DeadlyReentry](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/54954-1-0-Deadly-Reentry-v7-0-2-update-May-14-2015)

[EngineLighting](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/121987)

[Heat Management](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/118189-1-0-2-Heat-Management-3-75m-parts-and-emissive-heat-animations-%280-22-17-5-15%29)

[HotRockets!](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/65754-HotRockets!-Particle-FX-Replacement-Tutorial)

[Kerbal Joint Reinforcement](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/55657-1-0-2-Kerbal-Joint-Reinforcement-v3-1-3-4-27-15)

[Kerbal Alarm Clock](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/24786-1-0-x-Kerbal-Alarm-Clock-v3-3-1-1-%28May-4%29)

[Kerbal Engineer](http://www.curse.com/ksp-mods/kerbal/222685-kerbal-engineer-redux)

[KSP Trajectory Optimization Tool](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/36476-WIN-MAC-KSP-Trajectory-Optimization-Tool-v1-3-1-Update-for-KSP-1-0!)

[MechJeb2](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/12384-PART-1-0-2-Anatid-Robotics-MuMech-MechJeb-Autopilot-v2-5-1)

[ModuleRCSFX](https://github.com/NathanKell/ModuleRCSFX/releases)

[PlanetShine](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/96497-0-25-1-0-2-PlanetShine-v0-2-3-1)

[Procedural Fairings](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/39512-1-0-2-Procedural-Fairings-3-14-FAR-Euler-support-%28May-10%29)

[SCANsat](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/80369)

[Stock Bug Fix Modules](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/97285-KSP-v1-0-2-Stock-Bug-Fix-Modules-%28Release-v1-0-2d-3-18-May-15%29)

[Transfer Window Planner](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/93115-1-0-x-Transfer-Window-Planner-v1-3-0-1-%28May-5%29)

[SELV - Stockalike Expandable Launch Vehicle](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/122576-SELV-Stockalike-Expendable-Launch-Vehicles-V-1-0-KSP-1-0x)
